bill_title: exempt property that is located within an improvement district from taxation by a township.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt property that is located within an improvement district from taxation by a township. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 7-25A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No township may levy a property tax on any property located within the boundaries of an improvement district. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
